title: Netflix customers canceling service increasingly includes long-term subscribers
content:
Netflix lost 200,000 subscribers last quarter and potentially two million this current period, according to a note to shareholders from last month. Now, new research highlights that the number of long-standing subscribers canceling the streaming service rose in the past few years.

moreâ€¦

description: New research highlights that the number of Netflix long-standing subscribers canceling the streaming service rose in the past few years.
